title: Eight cats
riddle: One man went on vacation and asked a friend to look after his cat. A week later, there were 8 adult cats running around the apartment.
solution: The next day the cat ran away and the friend had to post a lost pet notice. Since he still did not know the cat very well, he had to keep all the similiar-looking cats that people brought to him, and wait for the owner to return , who would have to identify his pet.
